moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.effect: Has a chance (20%) of lowering the target’s Sp. Def by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Dire Hit +
moves.effect: Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Phantom Force
moves.effect: The user takes on a phantom presence. After a set time, this presence fades and the user attacks. No other actions can be taken while in phantom presence. Opponents’ moves will not hit the user while it is in this presence. If the user is hit by a sync move while in phantom presence, the presence will fade.

moves.name: Pierce the Veil!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by 2 stat ranks. Raises the user’s Attack by 4 stat ranks instead when it is affected by a status condition. Raises the user’s Sp. Atk and evasiveness by 1 stat rank. Raises the user’s Sp. Atk and evasiveness by 2 stat ranks instead when it is affected by a status condition.

passives.name: Shook 2
passives.description: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks the first time its HP drops to half or below each battle.

passives.name: Last Word
passives.description: The user uses Explosion immediately before fainting.

passives.name: Benefactor
passives.description: Transfers this sync pair’s stat increases to the sync pair that will switch in when this sync pair switches out.

grid.bonus: Shadow Ball:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Dire Hit +:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Phantom Force:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Phantom Force:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Pierce the Veil!:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Mad Strength 2- Has a chance (30%) of raising the user’s Attack by one stat rank when one of its attack moves is successful.
Gritty 5- Powers up the user’s moves when it is affected by a status condition.
Power Flux 3- The fuller the move gauge when moves are selected, the more this powers up moves.
Special Reserves 2- Raises the user’s Sp. Atk by 2 stat ranks the first time it is in a pinch each battle.
Blind Spot- The more the user’s evasiveness is raised, the more it powers up the user’s sync moves.
Shifty Striker 1- Has a chance (20%) of raising the user’s evasiveness by one stat rank when its Pokémon uses a move.
Pressure Cooker 9- Once per battle, reduces the user’s sync move countdown by one when in a pinch.
Demoralize 1- Lowers the Attack of all opposing sync pairs by 1 stat rank after using the user’s sync move.
